description.value:
Trigger You miss with your Strike during @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Channel Smite].

The energy from your smite persists for a moment, allowing you to pass it to a new target. Cast the 1-action version of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell you expended, targeting a creature other than the target of your Strike.
